title: [LFT] Serious Support who is selfless
body: I'm a support main who cares about the needs of others as I value others,in laning phase I ward tri and dragon. Then in mid game i ward dragon and baron. Supports I play in best to least best are Sona, Lulu, Leona, Thresh, Nami and Janna. I am also a serious player so I am looking for a serious team that plays in competitive tournaments.

replies.body: add wreck yo skuttle and talk to me
